internationalizations.description:
My Diploma of Computer Engineering in Government Polytechnic of Mumbai was the first stepping stone into the computer technology universe. The subjects taught helped me learn all the fundamental concepts of computer engineering which included hardware assembling, functions of hardware and software as well as their integration, programming languages, database management, web development, and networking. Academic projects helped me learn the practical implementations of the theoretical concepts taught in class. Some of the subjects I explored are:
  • Object Oriented Programming
  • Relational Database
  • Computer Graphics
  • Microprocessors and Programming
  • Computer Architecture
  • Computer Security
  • Network Management
  • Operating Systems

internationalizations.role: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
internationalizations.description:
In my Bachelors from University of Mumbai I achieved 3rd academic rank among class strength of 90 students. My final year project based on IOT was acknowledged by many including review panel of National Level Project Competition and received praise for my ideas on advanced applications for the technology used in project. I received a Certificate of Appreciation from the IT department for this project. In addition to that, I wrote and published two technical papers on the project that illustrate the design of the system having security embedded within automated office and emphasizes implementation of security methods in various infrastructures. The subjects introduced to me helped in acquiring in-depth knowledge of the fields:
  • Intelligent Systems
  • Computer Security
  • Data structures
  • Computer Networks
  • Big Data
  • Database Management

At University of Windsor I studied many advanced level subjects and explored several cutting-edge concepts in depth. From identifying new software engineering practices to generating new algorithms, I dived into several new and challenging tasks. I received Acknowledgement from Golden Key International Honor Society for Outstanding Academic Achievements during my Masters. Some of the subjects I learned are:
  • Advanced Software Engineering
  • Advanced Database Topics
  • Advanced Computing Concepts
  • Advanced Systems Programming
  • Networking and Data Security
  • Advanced Internet Applications
  • Emerging Paradigms in Computer Technology
